title: how do i stop my league icon from looking like this
body: idk why its like this and when i open it this happens. [](https://prnt.sc/g9ydag)

replies.body:
Right-click it -> Properties -> Change Icon... -> Browse -> navigate to where you got your League of Legends installation (only fools installs games on C:\ ), and chose the icon again.

The issue itself is a Windows thing, and IconCache.db (hidden file), located in:
>%userprofile%\AppData\Local

...is likely the culprit.

https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_7/wrong-or-missing-program-icons-in-windows-7-start/3fb5be69-105a-40ca-a0ca-695b8bad41f8?auth=1
You should be able to just delete that one, and create a new one!  Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe.  Right click -> Send To -> Desktop.
